text: “Mba rivgiap taagia khimtɨn zi gumgi gum, na khothɨgɨ thagi gumgi gum, tɨvi mbatɨgi guarira mbui gumgi gum, gumgi shogi mbe vhɨzgi gumgi gum, ruarir gumgi gu mbigi kɨɨv, mbe ndi tɨvi ga mbui gumgi gum, kugi ga mbuav mba harigi tori gu bigi ga mbui gumgi gum, mbarɨvi gu tori rotu mbui gumgi gum, mba bigi guiguigi gumgi, mbe zam, mbe wari won ŋgu ŋgirɨrga. Mben ŋgu, ana mba sarfa vhava bakɨme shiav mbɨ fara muuŋgiap givigi. Mbe anan ŋgirgɨrga. Ana mbe phenatɨtɨgap vhɨzi vhɨzeŋ ma.”
